attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Amphetamine abuse is a frightning addiction ALSO deadly ,yet dex-amfetamine is not used to its potential.Docors should not be afraid to prescribe,when the person genrally needs it due to deadly withdrawl from amphetamine. The dosage given should be individual,not as it is now,looked at, as a whole if somebody needs 35 tablets,prescribe them.10mg/20mg pills,like in other countrys SHOULD BE AVAILABLE,then there would be no need to ask for 25/30 tablets.DEXEDRINE IS NEEDED AS BAD AS MORPHENE YET HELD BACK BY DOCTORS FEARS.....

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
